name: Dead Earnest (LD52)
description:
Your name is Earnest and you've just died. Bad luck. But you've been blessed with the skill to harvest body parts and attach them to yourself to prevent deterioration. of course these harvested parts will deteriorate too. You can also use these parts to create your own monstrosities to help in your quest to survive and find the life stone which can bring you back to life. On your way, you can kill humans and 'some monster kind' to harvest parts to help your quest.

PROJECT MADE FOR LUDUM DARE 52

Music by Ricky Summer

https://rickysummer.bandcamp.com/

## Controls:

WASD - Move

Left mouse button - Attack / move items

Right mouse button - Turn camera

Mouse scrollwheel - Zoom in/out

E - Pick up items

## NOTE: The settings may or may not work.
